record.id: field.name="absolute" and file.name="info" and term="Absolute" and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: absolute
record.file.name: info

brief.brief: Determines whether any intervals referenced by this schedule are absolute.
Allowable values are y, n, or blank. Both y and n are stored as true or false fields and displayed as y or n.
An unknown condition (blank field) evaluates to true.

The term absolute, when used in conjunction with the operating hour tables, refers to time intervals. An absolute interval of 1 day (1 00:00:00) is 24 working hours. The same interval, when not absolute, is 1 workday, however long the workday is.

detail.detail: This is a Boolean (type 4) field. It is the second field in a structure (type 9) within an array (type 8).
